project.description: Phycas is Python software for phylogenetic analysis
project.summary: Phycas is both a script that can be used for Bayesian phylogenetic analyses as well as a library that can be used to construct your own Python programs for phylogenetic analyses.

throwError.text: Please uninstall the existing version and then run this installer again

booleanParameter.name: installsources
booleanParameter.title: Install Source Code
booleanParameter.explanation: Should the C++ source code be installed (Note: this is optional, the source code is not needed to run Phycas or use the PyPhy library)?

infoParameter.name: pythonversionwarning
infoParameter.title: Python Requirement
infoParameter.description: This page is shown if python is installed but version is not at least 2.4
infoParameter.explanation: It appears that you do not have Python 2.4 (or later) installed. The version detected is shown below. You may continue to install Phycas, but you will not be able to use it until upgrade Python to the latest version (download Python from http://www.python.org/).

infoParameter.name: nopythonwarning
infoParameter.title: Python Requirement
infoParameter.description: This page is shown if no version of python can be detected
infoParameter.explanation: It appears that you do not have Python installed. You may continue to install Phycas, but you will not be able to use it until you also install Python (download Python from the web site shown below).

infoParameter.name: debuginfoparam
infoParameter.title: Debugging Information
infoParameter.description: This page is only for showing debugging information
infoParameter.explanation: Here are some installer variables that have been set:

throwError.text: You must install Python version 2.4 (or greater) before installing Phycas. Python can be downloaded from http://www.python.org/

You must install Python version 2.4 (or greater) before installing Phycas. The version of Python that is currently installed is ${pythonversionstr} The latest version of Python can be downloaded from http://www.python.org/
Python2.4 executable not found! Please install the python (version 2.4 or greater) or add the path to python2.4 to your shell's $PATH variable.
